name: balls, in space
description:
incoming transmission:

an unidentified flying object has been spotted in space and is damaging our satellites! It's up to you to use the magnificent power of quantum space balls™ to brick break your way through the obstruction

feedback and bug reports:

dev@cyberoats.com

controls:

- hit the spacebar to begin

- use WASD or arrow keys to move the paddle

made with Unity Engine

bagel jam 2k22
